code: @Override protected void configureDataFormat(DataFormat dataFormat, CamelContext camelContext) {     if (request != null) {         setProperty(camelContext, dataFormat, "request", request).     } }

comment: /**  * Whether to marshal/unmarshal request or response  * <p/>  * Is by default false  */
code: /**  * Whether to marshal/unmarshal request or response  * <p/>  * Is by default false  */ public void setRequest(Boolean request) {     this.request = request. }
